award_title: Columbia University/ R/V Marcus G. Langseth Oceanographic Technical Services - Year 1 of 5
subject: shared instrumentation, shared headaches
body:
Hi Sean,

Given your work coordinating technical services and shared-use instrumentation across the research fleet, you're probably familiar with the challenge of making tools actually accessible and maintainable across different users and projects.

I built something called Ouro after hitting that wall myself—Ouro helps researchers share computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable and durable, rather than a zip file buried in supplementary materials.

Not sure if it's relevant to the technical services side of things, but figured it might be worth a look given how much coordination goes into keeping shared instrumentation calibrated and documented.

I can set up access for your lab if you want to take a glance.

Hope you get some downtime over winter break—happy holidays.

Cheers,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
